bwwExcerpt: Well, does it kill? The answer is definitely yes, no and sometimes. In other words, success depends on what's happening in 'American Psycho,' the alternately dazzling and dull musical...in the middle is Benjamin Walker ('Bloody Bloody Andrew Jackson'), so weird and nuanced as Patrick that misgivings about the vehicle feel almost churlish...I wouldn't want to lose a swatch of Es Devlin's ever-morphing box set with the amazing nonstop videos by Finn Ross...Katrina Lindsay's costumes are ideally flattering and ridiculous. The least subtle element is Lynne Page's choreography...
